project_name.justification: The project name is explicitly mentioned in the document header: 'Project Name [Smackover Li Brine Project]'.

company_name.justification: The company is identified in the announcement as 'Pantera Minerals Limited (ASX: PFE) (“Pantera” or the “Company”)'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The announcement quotes the company's chairman: 'Commenting on the new leased acres, Executive Chairman Barnaby Egerton-Warburton said:'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction involves leasing land ('25,998 net acres now leased') and not the acquisition of a percentage interest in a project from another company.

primary_commodity.justification: The document repeatedly refers to the project as a lithium project, for example: 'PFE FURTHER EXPANDS ACRES IN THE SMACKOVER LITHIUM BRINE PLAY'.

verified_article_link.justification: The provided text is a direct company announcement and does not contain a web link to an article.

currency.justification: No financial consideration for the transaction (leasing of acres) is mentioned in the text.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The text describes the acquisition of leased acres but does not specify any cash payment amount for the transaction.

share_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any payment in shares for the leased acres.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The text does not mention any combined cash and share payment for the leased acres.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not mention any issuance of shares as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any payment in warrants as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any payment in options as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions future drilling plans ('New well drilling and brine sampling') but does not specify a committed number of meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text does not specify a monetary value for an exploration commitment as part of this transaction.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or similar royalty as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The announcement states the total leased acreage: 'The Project now covers a land position of +25,998 net leased acres of lithium brine prospective ground in the Smackover Formation Arkansas...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is specified in the same sentence as the area value: '...25,998 net leased acres...'

resource_size.justification: The text provides a conceptual Exploration Target with a quantified mass: 'The Project has established a conceptual Exploration Target5 ranging from 436,000 to 2,966,000 tonnes of contained LCE within the project’s 50,000-acre Exclusive Abstract Area...'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly stated in the text: 'Pantera Minerals Limited (ASX: PFE)'.
